thread.title: Anna

author: Anna
title: Anna
text: Using it after 2 weeks my Mum's weakness has gone, she sleeps very well. Before using CBD oil she only slept 2 or 3 hours at night. She also had mental problem which is also gone, she can think clearly, no disturbing thoughts. She takes 2 drops 3 times a day. I only tried once, I am allergic to dust. I put 3 drops under my tongue in the evening, the very next day I did not have sneezing attack. Very happy with this product I will order it for myself as well.
